segments.text: Pretty good . The HR manager asked me the usual questions . Then he wondered why I had decided to leave my previous job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told him that I hadn ’ t got a raise for three years . I also told him that one of my best co-workers quitted her job because she had not been promoted for eight years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did he want to know the reasons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I told him that my boss made some excuses of the recession . But I thought he had a pattern and a record of promoting men only .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s sex discrimination . When will you get the reply ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In a couple of days , I was told .
segments.speaker: S2
